
#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
 int t;unsigned long int arr[1007];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t>0)
    {
        unsigned long int n;unsigned long int x=0;
        scanf("%li",&n);

        x=n%1007;


            if(arr[x]==x)
            {

            }
            else{arr[x]=x;
            printf("%d\n",x);
        }

        t--;
    }
return 0;}
